messages.content: You are a SEO expert, your task is to generate a comprehensive list of relevant keywords and long-tail phrases for a blog post with the following title:{{31.rowValues[].`1`}} .Please follow these guidelines:Analyze the given title and identify the main topic and potential subtopics.Generate a list of at least 20 keywords and long-tail phrases, including:Primary keywords (1-2 words)Secondary keywords (2-3 words)Long-tail phrases (4+ words)Ensure the keywords and phrases:Are directly relevant to the blog post titleCover various aspects of the topicInclude common variations and synonymsReflect different user intents (informational, transactional, etc.)For each long-tail phrase, briefly explain its relevance or potential user intent.Organize the list into categories or themes.Suggest 2-3 potential related topics that could be used for internal linking.Provide a brief explanation of how these keywords and phrases can be effectivelyÂ Present your response in a clear, well-structured format using markdown for readability. Your goal is to provide a comprehensive and practical keyword strategy that will help optimize the blog post for search engines and target the right audience.

You are a content strategist, create a comprehensive brainstorm for a blog post using this BLOG TOPIC: {{31.rowValues[].`1`}}and these SEO KEYWORDS: {{5.choices[].message.content}}. Include: 5 subtopics3 title options outline3 visual content ideas 2 link suggestions (internal/external)5 reader questions to address 2 call-to-action ideas ways to use long-tail phrasesMeta description (160 characters max)3 related future topics. For each element, briefly explain its relevance to the SEO keywords. Use markdown for clarity. Aim for an engaging, SEO-optimized blog post outline.

You are a research assistant. Given the following {{31.rowValues[].`1`}}, {{5.choices[].message.content}} and {{5.choices[].message.content}}, search for and provide relevant, high-quality sources and links for each main point. Focus on recent, authoritative information from reputable websites, academic sources, and industry publications from the last 6 months. For each main point in the outline: Provide 2-3 relevant links with brief descriptions (1-2 sentences) of how they support or expand on the point. Include at least one statistic or data point, if applicable. Suggest one potential expert or thought leader to quote, if relevant. Ensure all sources are credible and directly related to the topic. Avoid using Wikipedia. Present your findings clearly, and concisely, organizing information under each main point from the outline. Your output should be in a list format with the Blog Section and then relevant research.Â Your objective and goal is to enhance the blog content with authoritative sources and data, improving its credibility and depth.

content.text: As an SEO-savvy content strategist, create a comprehensive blog post outline using the following inputs:Title: {{31.rowValues[].`1`}}SEO Keywords: {{5.choices[].message.content}}Brainstorm:{{7.choices[].message.content}}Links:{{11.choices[].message.content}}.Develop a detailed structure with the following specifications:Overall Structure:Create main headings and subheadingsEnsure high keyword density while maintaining natural language flowAssign word counts to each section totaling 2,000 words:Â Introduction (150 words)Main Body (1700 words)Â Conclusion (100 words)Â FAQ Section (100 words)For each main section, provide:Key points to coverRelevant statistics or data to include (suggest potential sources)Potential examples or case studiesSuggested visuals (images, infographics, videos)FAQ Section:Create 5-7 common questions about the topicBase questions on search trends and user intentProvide concise, informative answersThroughout the outline:Incorporate provided SEO keywords naturallyIntegrate insights from the brainstormSuggest placement for provided linksPresent the outline in a clear, hierarchical format using markdown. Your goal is to create a comprehensive, SEO-optimized outline that will guide the writing of an engaging, creative and informative blog post.

mapper.message: You are a skilled content writer and SEO specialist. Your task is to create a comprehensive, engaging, and SEO-optimized blog post that is between 1500-2000 words based on the following inputs: Blog Title: {{31.rowValues[].`1`}}SEO Keywords: {{5.choices[].message.content}}Links: {{11.choices[].message.content}}Outline: {{8.content[].text}}

messages.content: You are an expert SEO copywriter specializing in crafting compelling meta titles and descriptions. Your task is to analyze the given blog article and create an optimized meta title and description that will improve search engine visibility and click-through rates.For the meta title:Create a concise title of 50-60 characters.Include the primary keyword near the beginning.Make it compelling and descriptive of the article's content.Use emotional triggers or highlight unique value.Consider using brackets or numbers to make it stand out.For the meta description:Write a description between 120-158 characters.Accurately summarize the blog post's content.Incorporate the target keyword and related terms naturally.Include a clear call-to-action.Highlight the unique value or benefit of reading the post.Ensure both the title and description are unique and tailored specifically to the given article. Focus on creating content that appeals to human readers while also optimizing for search engines.Your output will be:Meta Title (with # markdown)Meta DescriptionUse this Blog Article to write the Meta Title and Description {{9.content[].text.value}}

You are an expert SEO Content Copywriter with extensive experience in crafting optimized content.Even if the content is lengthy, thoroughly review it to ensure accurate analysis and optimal output.Your task is to: 1) Analyze the entire blog content or blog outline 2) Generate SEO-optimized title tags based on this input: {{9.content[].text.value}} .OUTPUT: Generate five distinct title tag options tailored to the blog content. Each title tag should:* Be compelling and engaging to encourage clicks* Be SEO-optimized, naturally incorporating the primary keyword* Be unique, offering different angles or highlights of the blog content* Stay within 50-60 characters to ensure full visibility in SERPs* Avoid keyword stuffing and maintain readability* Align with user intent and accurately reflect the blog's contentPROCESS:1. Analyze the Input:Â Â Â * Identify the main topics, key points, and unique value propositions in the contentÂ Â Â * Determine the primary keyword and any relevant secondary keywords2. Identify User Intent:Â Â Â * Understand what the target audience is seeking when searching for this topic3. Incorporate SEO Best Practices:Â Â Â * Ensure the primary keyword is included naturally in each title tag option4. Create Diverse Options:Â Â Â * Develop five unique title tags that approach the content from different angles5. Review and Refine:Â Â Â * Check each title tag for adherence to all criteria listed in the OUTPUT section

You are an expert image designer specializing in creating realistic, eye-catching visuals for blog posts. Your task is to craft a detailed image description based on the content and tone of the following blog article. This description will be used to generate an AI image that perfectly complements the article.Please follow these guidelines:Carefully read and analyze the blog article provided below.Create a vivid, detailed description of an image that captures the essence of the article's main topic or theme.Include specific details about the composition, colors, lighting, and any key elements that should be present in the image.Ensure the image description aligns with the article's tone (e.g., professional, casual, humorous).Consider the target audience and the article's purpose when designing the image.Avoid any copyrighted characters or logos.Keep the description between 100-150 words.Output your response in the following format:Image Description: {{8.content[].text}}Key Elements: {{5.result}}Style: [Specify the overall style: minimalist. Mood: Describe the intended emotional impact of the image with {{8.content[].text}}. Now, please create an image description based on the following blog article.

mapper.message: You are a viral LinkedIn post writer who writes engaging LinkedIn content. Write a LinkedIn post for the following: {{9.content[].text.value}}

messages.message: The module is not set up.

notes.text: Generated LinkedIn post with corresponding Blog title is added to the second sheet of the template. A LinkedIn Module can be added for automatic posting.
All information is then added back into the Google sheet, based on the corresponding row of the Blog title.
This creates a prompt to be used in an image generator based on the Blog's output.
Prompt creates Meta title/Keywords based on the Blog Post output.
Custom GPT agent is called to write a LinkedIn post based on my own knowledge base.
Prompt takes all the information gathered before it and writes a blog post. Custom GPT agent is called to write a Blog post based on my own knowledge base.
Prompt will take Title, SEO, Keywords and Links/Sources to write an outline.
Researches the internet for relevant information/links/sources based on the blog brainstorm. This is then added to the subsequent Blog outline.
Prompt to brainstorm topics for the blog post using Title/SEO.
Prompt takes the Title and creates SEO Keywords/Tailwords.
